translations: n.执政官（古代雅典九名统治者之一）；统治者

phrs.translation: 执政官铠甲, 执政官之甲, 朝官之甲, 在朝官铠甲
黑暗头领, 红球, 黑暗执政官, 暗中在朝官

sentences.sentence: Archon Beed Thane of Vergill was particularly opposed, and theatrically insulted Leia Organa Solo in order to provoke an honor duel from Isolder.
sentences.translation: 尤其是弗吉尔星球的执政官比德·塞恩还极力反对。他甚至大肆羞辱莱娅·奥加纳·索洛，逼迫伊索尔德和自己进行荣誉决斗。

sentences.sentence: The powers of these avatars of psionic might extend well beyond those of the regular archon, more than compensating for their lack of any physical attack capability.
sentences.translation: 的权力，把这些替身的心灵感应可能远远超出那些经常执政官，超过补偿其缺乏任何物理攻击能力。

sentences.sentence: As I am writing this, an important operation of the Light forces on the surface of the planet is healing the Congo portal, the focal point of the Archon invasion of 1996.
sentences.translation: 我在撰写这篇文章的同时，地表的光明势力正在进行疗愈刚果门户，也就是1996年执政官入侵地球所使用的门户。
